name: Introduction to Asian Art
description: This course provides an introduction to the history of Asian art from the earliest civilizations to the present day.

name: The Arts of China and Japan
description: This course examines the major art trends of China and Japan, from the ancient period to the modern day.

name: The Arts of India and Southeast Asia
description: This course examines the major art trends of India and Southeast Asia, from the ancient period to the modern day.

name: The Art of Islamic Cultures
description: This course examines the major art trends of Islamic cultures, from the ancient period to the modern day.

name: Advanced Asian Art
description: This course is a more in-depth examination of Asian Art, focusing on specific topics such as Chinese painting, Japanese woodblock prints, and Indian sculpture.
prerequisites: The Arts of China and Japan
The Arts of India and Southeast Asia
